meanings.definition: To exert together with another or others.
meanings.sent1: The team was coexerting to lift the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: The students were coexerting to finish the group project on time.
meanings.sent3: The ants were coexerting to carry the food back to their nest.
meanings.sent4: The dancers were coexerting their movements to create a beautiful performance.
meanings.sent5: The firefighters were coexerting to put out the blazing fire.

meanings.definition: To work together in a coordinated effort.
meanings.sent1: The volunteers were coexerting to clean up the park.
meanings.sent2: The doctors and nurses were coexerting to save the patient's life.
meanings.sent3: The chefs were coexerting in the kitchen to prepare a delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: The athletes were coexerting to win the championship game.
meanings.sent5: The musicians were coexerting to create a harmonious melody.
